passages.content:
Titan-Compiler Pro: Licensing Options (Annual Subscription)
- Node-Locked License: $1,200 per machine (Fixed to one PC)
- Floating License: $3,500 per concurrent user (Shared across a network)

*Maintenance Fee: $500 per year is required for each Floating License to cover cloud-sync features.
*Bulk Discount: A 15% discount is applied to the base price when purchasing 10 or more Node-Locked licenses in a single transaction.
*Upgrade Policy: Users can convert a Node-Locked license to a Floating license by paying the price difference plus a $200 processing fee.

passages.title: Inventory Report - Project 'Rust-Node'
passages.footer: Total active engineers for Project 'Rust-Node': 12 members.

passages.content:
From: T. Sato <t.sato@embedded-dev.jp>
To: Procurement Dept
Date: February 15

Regarding the upcoming 'Rust-Node' project expansion, we currently have 12 engineers but only enough licenses to support 6 people simultaneously (3 shared floating seats + 3 fixed licenses). Since 5 of our new members work in different time zones, we want to purchase 2 additional Floating licenses instead of individual ones. Also, I would like to convert my personal Node-Locked license (TC-005) to a Floating one so I can access it from both my office and lab PCs. Please process this before the renewal date.

questions.q: How many Floating license seats does the 'Rust-Node' project currently have access to?
questions.explanation: 文書2の表の1行目に「Floating (3 seats)」と記載されています。

questions.q: What is the total annual maintenance fee the company currently pays for its Floating licenses?
questions.explanation: 文書1に「Floating License 1つにつき$500の保守費が必要」とあり、文書2より現在は3シート分（TC-001）のFloatingライセンスを所有しているため、3 × $500 = $1,500 となります。

questions.q: How much will it cost to convert Mr. Sato’s current license (TC-005) to a Floating one?
questions.explanation: 文書1のUpgrade Policyにより、「差額 + 手数料$200」が必要です。($3,500 - $1,200) + $200 = $2,500 となります。

questions.q: According to the email, why does Mr. Sato prefer Floating licenses for the new members?
options: To take advantage of the 15% bulk discount
Because the members work in different geographical locations
To reduce the total number of licenses to under 10
Because the Node-Locked licenses are currently out of stock
questions.explanation: 文書3に「new members work in different time zones（新メンバーは異なる時間帯＝地域で働いている）」ため、個別のライセンスよりFloating（共有）が良いと述べています。

questions.q: What is implied about the company's next purchase?
options: It will not qualify for a 15% discount.
It will include 12 new Node-Locked licenses.
It will be processed after March 1.
It will be handled by Mr. Sato personally.
questions.explanation: 文書1の割引は「Node-Lockedを10個以上購入」した場合に適用されます。文書3で佐藤氏が希望しているのは「Floatingライセンスの追加」と「変換」であるため、この割引条件には当てはまりません。
